articles.description: "If you believe in competition, you should believe in this deal."
articles.content: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella has spoken up to defend his company's blockbuster proposed acquisition of Activision Blizzard, saying it will help generate even more competition in the gaming space, not … [+1977 chars]
